DOC.brief_summary: This study design determine whether treatment COREG MR effective maintaining well lipid profile treatment TOPROL-XL hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: COREG MR Versus TOPROL-XL On The Lipid Profile Of Normolipidemic Or Mildly Dyslipidemic Patients With Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Documented history hypertension Triglycerides 120400 mg/mL LDLc level require lipid lower medication . Has know contraindication alpha betablocker therapy . Has take nonocular betablockers within three month screen . Has Type I II diabetes . Taking lipid lower medication .
